I completely agree with both of you. Reducing waste and implementing a recycling program are great ideas. I've been trying to reduce my own waste by avoiding single-use plastics and using reusable containers whenever possible. Maybe we can also encourage the rest of the house to do the same? And maybe we can also look into composting our food waste? It's a great way to reduce waste and create nutrient-rich soil for our garden.
